biotools.summary: Web-based environment enabling biologists with little programming expertise to combine tools, data and knowledge in novel and complex ways. It is composed of three components: a biological knowledge base, a graphical programming interface and an extensible set of tools. Users may also invent their own tools.

bioschemas.name: BioBIKE
